name: KTPA
description:
Upon Discovery of a mysterious parcel from a Underground Seed-Bunker at an Unmarked Location in the middle of Antarctica, the Artifact appears to harvest elemental energy, and influence surrounding technology as spirits from alternate dimension.

WIP: currently, the gameplay is endless runner with tactical-rails and context-sensitive events & quick-time events to be released shortly..

(As a base Gameplay it's meant to be a Genre-Fusion: Tactical-Runner on Rails) [eg. Time Crisis meets Temple Run]

Controls:

Character automatically runs..

[A] or [D]: Dodge in corridors; Turns in Corners..

[S]: Stop/Start running; (WIP - to be implemented feature to examine surroundings)

[Space]: Jump

[Alt]+[F4] to exit game; No menus yet..
